com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.list

Class SizedJavaList<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.list.DynamicSizedJavaList<E>
      • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.list.SizedJavaList<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Element type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.Collection<E>, java.util.List<E>

    public class SizedJavaList<E>
extends DynamicSizedJavaList<E>
implements java.util.List<E>
    A size limited implementation of List. Obs: Changing input list will break the size limit constraint, make sure to not modify the input list. This is an extension of DynamicSizedJavaList, which have a constant size.
